description: Students consider a selected figure or movement from the history of philosophy. May be repeated if topics are different. Prerequisites: two courses in philosophy, one of which must be either 235 or 236 or permission of the department chair. Counts towards ancient studies and medieval studies majors.
name: Sem:History of Philosophy
prerequisites: Prerequisites: two courses in philosophy, one of which must be either 235 or 236 or permission of the department chair. Counts towards ancient studies and medieval studies majors.
title: Seminar in the History of Philosophy
